text: Martin Raymond Keown (born 24 July 1966) is a retired English football player. He played as a defender from 1984 to 2005. He is most known for playing in the Premier League for Arsenal. He made more than 400 appearances for the club and won 10 honours. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League FA Cup League Cup Europe
